header_text: You decide to email your department promoting something important to you. Someone responds rudely because they misinterpreted what you wrote. You wonder what this person thinks about you, and feel worried.

elements.Text: Are you anxious about what the person thinks about you?

elements.name: You decide to email your department promoting something important to you. Someone responds rudely because they misinterpreted what you wrote. You wonder what this person thinks about you, and feel worried._Mental Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
